h2_title: Where To Use The Keeness of Tiger in Black Myth: Wukong
content: Then, the second can be found at the bottom of the sand hill leading on from the Fright Cliff - Rock Clash Platform Shrine, which is just after the Stone Vanguard fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Keeness_of_Tiger.md', within the main section titled 'Keeness of Tiger', specifically from the subsection 'Where To Use The Keeness of Tiger in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
Then, the second can be found at the bottom of the sand hill leading on from the Fright Cliff - Rock Clash Platform Shrine, which is just after the Stone Vanguard fight.
